thread.section_title: Park Hyatt Paris - Vendome - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: wonderful service, great location
thread.title_full: wonderful service, great location - Review of Park Hyatt Paris - Vendome, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Donna G
title: wonderful service, great location
text: We had Hyatt points that paid for this, so of course that was the best. We arrived too early for check in due to a very early flight. . The staff made sure we had a place to relax until our room was ready. The conceirges gave terrific advie on what to do and when to do. Merci to everyone.
